mapper.select: -- status는 숫자로 게임 판매 여부를 표현. 1. 검수 중 | 2. 테스팅 중 | 3. 통과 SELECT G.id, G.title, G.genre, G.description, G.release_date releaseDate, G.price, G.developer, G.publisher, G.rating, G.sales FROM game G LEFT OUTER JOIN genre ON G.genre = genre.id LEFT OUTER JOIN developer ON G.developer = developer.id LEFT OUTER JOIN publisher ON G.publisher = publisher.id WHERE G.id = #{gameId} AND G.status = 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game ( id, title, genre, description, release_date, price, developer, publisher, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{genre}, #{description}, #{releaseDate}, #{price}, #{developer}, #{publisher}, 1 )
